name: "The Fields of Grey Complete Set"
description:
"Fields of Grey Complete Set", is a collage NFT that includes all 26 photos with title, and the poem written by DeadPanZoom for "The Fields of Grey" project. 25 editions of "The Fields of Grey Complete Set" were minted.

"The Fields of Grey" project is a visual chronicle narration of a communities progression, but also one of personal growth and empowerment. "The Fields of Grey" leaves many open-ended interpretations up to the individual viewer.  

"The Fields of Grey" project is a series of 26 photographical NFTs with underlying meanings that were taken August 2021 in Kapatagan, Philippines.  All "The Fields of Grey" 1-26 photo NFTs are minted as 1/1.
Except for photo #1(As Above,so Below) which is 100 editions and airdropped to the dpznft community.

Photos from top to bottom

1-As Above, so below
2-Purpose Amidst Chaos
3-The Way Up
4-Something good awaits
5-The making of tomorrow I
6-Greeneries on Black and White
7-The making of tomorrow II
8-Fruits of labor I
9-Tomorrow is now I
10-Resilience
11-Tomorrow is now II
12-Magnum Opus
13-Taking chances
14-Stand Tall
15-Stay grounded
16-Fruits of labor II
17-The choice
18-Bound Together
19-Life's a ride
20-Life's a ride II
21-Life's a ride III
22-The Dreamer
23-Children of Tomorrow
24-The palace among plants
25-Greyscale Creation
26-Perception
